pkgmetadata.longdescription: Fisher-Shannon Method // Proposes non-parametric estimates of the Fisher information measure and the Shannon entropy power. The state-of-the-art studies related to the Fisher-Shannon measures, with new analytical formulas for positive unimodal skewed distributions are presented in Guignard et al. arXiv:1912.02452. A 'python' version of this work is available on 'github' and 'PyPi' ('FiShPy').
